description: Unique identifier for this asset comment record; used as the primary key.
Reference to the asset this comment applies to; links to the asset master.
System timestamp when the comment record was created.
Username or source that created the comment (e.g., system, user account).
Setting controlling how this note is propagated or copied to related records or transactions; likely a coded value; confirm with SME.
Flag or code indicating whether/where the note should appear on printed documents; likely enumerated; confirm with SME.
Free-text notes about the asset; may include structured key-value details captured by integration or forms.
Account that last modified this record; blank if unchanged since creation or set by system.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
Timestamp of the last change attributed to a user action, distinct from automated updates; confirm with SME.
Internal identifier of the user who created the record; null when created by system process.
Timestamp recorded from the user context when the record was created; may differ from server time; confirm with SME.
Internal identifier of the user who last modified the record.
Timestamp recorded from the user context when the record was last modified; confirm with SME.
